title: Includes possession of armor piercing, frangible or devastator ammunition as criminal possession of a weapon
summary: Includes possession of armor piercing, frangible or devastator ammunition as criminal possession of a weapon in the 4th degree and where possession is knowingly with intent to use against another, it shall constitute criminal possession of a weapon in the 3rd degree.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the possession of armor piercing, frangible or devastator ammunition
